attributes.action: Make It law Dads Have Equal Rights With Their Children
attributes.additional_details: It takes 2 people to make a baby then why are there baby and mother wards not "baby and parent" wards ? Why can a woman stop dads seeing their child because of a break up? Why should we have to suffer ? 2016 and this day and age we STILL are made out to be the bad ones when it's not fair and it's time we all stood up together.
attributes.background: 9 times out of 10 a separation usually results into Dads losing their time with their chidren. 50% of dads suffer abuse and/or have access stopped, we have to fork out thousands to have access this needs to change!

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
